markdownRemark.html:
Framer Motion is fully compatible with Styled Components.

import styled from "styled-components";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";

const Component = styled(motion.div)``;

frontmatter.title: Can I use Framer Motion with Styled Components?

fields.author: mattperry
fields.description: Framer Motion is fully compatible with Styled Components. Take a look at how simple the two work together.

pageContext.author: mattperry
